abilities.name: Last Breath
abilities.details: Yui's basic attack behind the target critical strikes for a percentage of the target's current health as bonus [ad]physical damage[/].

abilities.name: Flying Swallow
abilities.details: Yui launches 5 kunais in a cone-shaped direction, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) for each kunai hit.

abilities.name: Whirlwind Slash
abilities.details: Yui spins around with her blades, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all nearby enemies and [db]slowing[/] them for a short duration.

abilities.name: False Presence
abilities.details: Yui replaces herself with a Wooden Dummy that lasts for few seconds and appears behind a target enemy, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).[n]All on-going projectiles will go to the dummy instead and it has its own separate health bar.[n]After 1 second, Yui can recast Wooden Dummy again to replace the dummy with herself if it's still there.

abilities.name: Vanishing Mist
abilities.details: Yui detonates a smoke bomb, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all enemies hit and reduce their [db]vision[/].[n]The smoke will quickly expand into a circular area. Yui also becomes [bf]stealthed[/] and gains increased [ms]movement speed[/] while inside the smoke.[n]The Wooden Dummy also becomes [bf]stealthed[/] while inside the smoke.
